kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Get Source
kw.doc: Returns the entire source of the current page.

test.name: Verify the Salon user sign in successfully when input correct account in Sign In form

kw.name: Given system displays Sign in screen
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: When user input correct data in User name field
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'salon.dev@yopmail.com' into text field 'xpath=//Text[@Name='User Name']/following::Edit[@Name='Enter your username']'
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: And user input correct data in Password field
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Dev123!@#' into text field 'xpath=//Text[@Name='Password']/following::Edit[@Name='Enter your password']'
